if you want to remove ALL your gnome-settings and have nothing to loose you can do it like this: log in where you are (not graphically) and type rm -rf .gnome* (note the period before gnome)
then do ALT-F7 and log in normally, that will re-create all gnome settings as if you logged in for the first time
